data.title: John Varley
data.meta_description: John Varley currently works as an Instructional Designer and Video Producer with the Center for Online Innovation and Production at the University of Florida. Previously John worked with PGA Tour Entertainment as the Assistant Director on the PGA Tour Live broadcast. For fun, John enjoys hiking, sailing, and shooting UF athletics events including football, volleyball, baseball, and basketball.
data.text:
John Varley currently works as an Instructional Designer and Video Producer with the Center for Online Innovation and Production at the University of Florida. Previously John worked with PGA Tour Entertainment as the Assistant Director on the PGA Tour Live broadcast. For fun, John enjoys hiking, sailing, and shooting UF athletics events including football, volleyball, baseball, and basketball.

MFA Documentary Film, Wake Forest University

MA Mass Communication, University of Florida

BA Anthropology, Michigan State University
